reviews.text:
Very nice hotel with good staff. We got a guided breakfast tour the first morning, and breakfast itself was very good with a lot of options.
The room was comfy with one of the nicer views I've had from a hotel room, at least in the evening.
The spa was okay but still a big plus, the regular sauna was good but the steam sauna was to cold for my opinion.

The hotel is at a nice location, quite quick access from airport. The views from higher floors were stunning. What can be improved is when they check in guests they can give heada up that the rooms are not ready before 15:00 o’clock, as well as they can check the air conditioning more regularly. For example there was a particular room where it wasn’t working so it was quite cold, and the alternative to it was to provide me with small radiator - which simply wasn’t enough for the sq.m. Of the room.
Despite all above the staff is well mannered and quick to react and support. The Spa is small for the size of the hotel.

Beautiful hotel. Public underground parking. The top floor bar and restaurant were amazing, I went daily. Also a hidden cigar lounge. The host and bartenders were a great time. Shout out to the new guy. Went daily breakfast at the quarter where the lovely Nigerian lady was great conversation and honestly the best part of my experience. My only complaint was the room light switches. There was not a dim setting, either all or nothing, and at first my reading lights were broken but they quickly fixed them.

Visit in September 2024. Great hotel for a city-break. Spacious rooms, beautiful view of the city from floors 20th-29th. The restaurant on the top floor is worth a visit. Fast internet speed, definitely better than many similar hotels. Nice service in the lobby. Quite tasty breakfast, there is something for everyone.

The hotel is ideally located, offering a breathtaking view from the rooms. I highly recommend requesting a room on the highest floor available to fully enjoy the panoramic view of the city and the sea.

The overall experience was excellent. I made daily use of the well-equipped gym, which boasts a wide range of equipment, and the spa facilities. The sauna, steam bath, and the impressive pool on the 11th floor are simply astonishing.

Try the restaurant at the top floor.
